titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission (an independent, quasi-judicial agency that rules on disputes between employers and the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) over penalties or citations for job safety or health violations issued by OSHA inspectors).
